title: Reason: invalid token 'xyz' in CORS header 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods'
summary:
The response to the CORS request that was sent by the server includes
  an Access-Control-Allow-Methods header which includes at least one
  invalid method name.
short_title: Reason: invalid token 'xyz' in CORS header 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods'

parents.title: Reason: invalid token 'xyz' in CORS header 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods'

pageTitle: Reason: invalid token 'xyz' in CORS header 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods' - HTTP | MDN
